description: Non Material Amendment to Planning Permission 20/03059/HOU (Conversion of existing garage to habitable space. Erection of double storey front extension, single storey rear extension, first floor side/ rear extension with rear balcony and terrace. Associated changes to fenestration) to provide changes to fenestration layout on two elevations and minor adjustment to floor level of rear patio
decision_conditions: Condition 1 of 20/03059/HOU shall be amended as follows :The approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details: am243-DFP-AR-061-201-R00 Architecture GF - Planned statusam243-DFP-AR-061-202-R00 Architecture FF - Planned status19_00010_A Pl 00 01_Rev Pl2 Proposed Roof Plan am243-DEL-AR-062-203-R00 Proposed Elevations19_00010_A Pl Xx 00_Rev Pl2 Site Location Plan and Existing Site Topo Plan 19_00010_A Pl Xx 01_Rev Pl2 Proposed Site Plan 19_0010_Pl Ex 00_Rev Pl2 Existing Plans 19_0010_Pl Ex 01_Rev Pl2 Existing Elevations Design and Access Statement A Pl Xx 02_Block Site Plan_Rev Pl1 ARBORICULTURAL METHOD STATEMENT REV. 1 Special Foundation Letter ARBORICULTURAL IMPACT ASSESSMENT REPORT ARBORICULTURAL METHOD STATEMENT Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
